languages.text: {n}Странным образом голос монстра становится очень спокойным, почти человеческим.{/n} "Я не буду этого делать. Но вот они — не оставят вам выбора".
{n}The monster's voice becomes strangely calm, almost human-like.{/n} "I won't. But they will leave you no choice."
languages.original_text: {n}Странным образом голос монстра становится очень спокойным, почти человеческим.{/n} "Я не буду этого делать. Но вот они — не оставят вам выбора".

traits.locale_text: {n}The monster's voice becomes strangely calm, almost human-like.{/n} "I won't. But they will leave you no choice."
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaWrack

traits.locale_text: {n}The monster's voice becomes strangely calm, almost human-like.{/n} "I won't. But they will leave you no choice."
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaWrack

languages.text: {n}La voix du monstre se fait calme, presque humaine.{/n} « Non, je n'y crois pas. Mais eux, ils ne vous laisseront pas le choix. »
languages.original_text: {n}The monster's voice becomes strangely calm, almost human-like.{/n} "I won't. But they will leave you no choice."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix du monstre se fait calme, presque humaine.{/n} « Non, je n'y crois pas. Mais eux, ils ne vous laisseront pas le choix. »
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaWrack

languages.text: {n}怪物的声音变得异常平静，几乎像人类一样。{/n}“我不能，但他们会让你别无选择。”
languages.original_text: {n}The monster's voice becomes strangely calm, almost human-like.{/n} "I won't. But they will leave you no choice."

traits.locale_text: {n}怪物的声音变得异常平静，几乎像人类一样。{/n}“我不能，但他们会让你别无选择。”
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaWrack

languages.text: {n}不思議にも怪物の声が、まるで人間のように穏やかになものへ変わった。{/n}「俺はやらん。だが貴様に選択の余地は与えられんぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}The monster's voice becomes strangely calm, almost human-like.{/n} "I won't. But they will leave you no choice."

traits.locale_text: {n}不思議にも怪物の声が、まるで人間のように穏やかになものへ変わった。{/n}「俺はやらん。だが貴様に選択の余地は与えられんぞ」
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaWrack

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme des Monsters wird seltsam ruhig, fast menschlich.{/n} "Das werde ich nicht. Aber sie werden Euch keine Wahl lassen."
languages.original_text: {n}The monster's voice becomes strangely calm, almost human-like.{/n} "I won't. But they will leave you no choice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme des Monsters wird seltsam ruhig, fast menschlich.{/n} "Das werde ich nicht. Aber sie werden Euch keine Wahl lassen."
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaWrack

languages.text: {n}La voz del monstruo suena curiosamente serena, casi humana.{/n} «Yo no. Pero ellos no le dejarán otra opción».
languages.original_text: {n}The monster's voice becomes strangely calm, almost human-like.{/n} "I won't. But they will leave you no choice."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del monstruo suena curiosamente serena, casi humana.{/n} «Yo no. Pero ellos no le dejarán otra opción».
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaWrack

languages.text: {n}Canavarın sesinde insanı andıran, tuhaf bir sükûnet var.{/n} "Hayır ancak... Sana seçim hakkı tanımayacaklar."
languages.original_text: {n}The monster's voice becomes strangely calm, almost human-like.{/n} "I won't. But they will leave you no choice."
